GETWC_L(3) Library Functions Manual GETWC_L(3)

NAME

fgetwc_l, getwc_l, getwchar_l —
get next wide character from input stream

LIBRARY

Standard C Library (libc, -lc)

SYNOPSIS

#include <stdio.h>
#include <wchar.h>
#include <xlocale.h>

wint_t
fgetwc_l(FILE *stream, locale_t loc);

wint_t
getwc_l(FILE *stream, locale_t loc);

wint_t
getwchar_l(locale_t loc);

DESCRIPTION

The fgetwc_l(), getwc_l(), and getwchar_l() functions are extended locale versions of the fgetwc(), getwc(), and getwchar() functions, respectively. Refer to their manual pages for details. Also, see xlocale(3) for more information about extended locales.

SEE ALSO

getwc(3), xlocale(3)
March 11, 2005 Mac OS X 11.0
